sessions.focus: F017 complete: Standardized all component styling for Stitch compatibility. Replaced arbitrary pixel values with Tailwind's semantic size classes, unified color palette to slate-*, removed inline styles and !important declarations, and documented custom theme extensions in tailwind.config. All components now use proper Tailwind spacing scale (4px increments).
nextSteps: F021 - Link checking in CI to validate all internal/external links
